title: No-Bake Nut Cookies
steps: Combine 1 cup firmly packed brown sugar, 1/2 cup evaporated milk, 2 tablespoons butter or margarine, and 1/2 cup broken pecans in a heavy two-quart saucepan
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture bubbles across the surface
Continue boiling and stirring for 5 minutes
Remove from heat and stir in 1/2 teaspoon vanilla
Add 3 1/2 cups bite-size shredded rice biscuits and mix thoroughly
Drop the mixture onto wax paper to form about 30 clusters using two teaspoons
Let stand for approximately 30 minutes, until firm

title: Jewell Ball’s Chicken
steps: Spread 1 small jar of chipped beef, cut into pieces, over the bottom of a baking dish
Place 4 boneless chicken breasts on top
Mix together 1 can cream of mushroom soup and 1 carton sour cream
Pour the mixture evenly over the chicken
Bake uncovered at 275°F for 3 hours

title: Creamy Corn
steps: Place ingredients into a slow cooker
Cover and cook on low heat for about 4 hours
Stir before serving

title: Chicken Funny
steps: Boil 1 large whole chicken until fully cooked
Debone and cut into bite-size pieces
Place the chicken in a medium square casserole dish
Pour over chicken gravy and cream of mushroom soup, spreading evenly
Prepare Stove Top stuffing according to package directions
Spread the stuffing over the chicken mixture
Sprinkle shredded cheese on top
Bake at 350°F for about 20 minutes, until bubbly and lightly golden

title: Reese’s Cups Candy
steps: Mix together 1 cup peanut butter, 3/4 cup graham cracker crumbs, 1 cup melted butter, and 1 pound powdered sugar until smooth
Press the mixture firmly into an ungreased 13 x 9-inch pan
Melt 1 large package of chocolate chips and spread evenly over the top
Refrigerate for about 20 minutes, then cut into pieces before the chocolate fully hardens
Store in the refrigerator

title: Cheeseburger Potato Soup
steps: Wash 6 baking potatoes and prick them several times with a fork
Microwave the potatoes with a damp paper towel on high for 6 to 8 minutes, until tender, then let cool slightly
Cut the potatoes in half lengthwise, scoop out the pulp, and discard the skins
Brown 1 pound extra-lean ground beef in a skillet, drain, and set aside
Melt 2/3 cup butter or margarine over low heat in a large kettle, add flour and stir until smooth, then cook for 1 minute
Gradually add 6 cups milk, stirring constantly until thickened and bubbly
Stir in the potatoes, ground beef, 3/4 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, 2 tablespoons chopped green onion, and 1/2 cup cooked crumbled bacon
Heat gently without boiling
Stir in 1 carton (8 oz) sour cream if desired
Garnish with remaining cheese, bacon, and green onions

title: Rhubarb Coffee Cake
steps: Cream together 1 1/2 cups sugar and 1/2 cup butter
Add 1 egg and beat well
Alternately add 1 cup buttermilk and a mixture of 2 cups flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon soda
Mix thoroughly, then stir in 2 cups finely chopped rhubarb and 1 teaspoon vanilla
Pour into a greased 9 x 13-inch pan and add topping as desired before baking

title: Scalloped Corn
steps: Mix together 1 can cream-style corn, 1 can whole kernel corn, about 20 crushed saltine crackers, 1 beaten egg, 2 teaspoons melted butter, and pepper to taste
Transfer to a buttered baking dish
Dot the top with the remaining 4 teaspoons butter
Bake at 350°F for 1 hour

title: Nolan’s Pepper Steak
steps: Roll 1 1/2 pounds round steak cut into strips in flour
Brown in a skillet, then season with salt and pepper
Combine the reserved tomato liquid from 1 can of tomatoes with 1 3/4 cups water and 1/2 cup onions
Add the browned steak, cover, and simmer for 1 hour and 15 minutes
Uncover, stir in 1 1/2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, then add the tomatoes and 2 diced green peppers
Simmer for 5 minutes and serve over hot cooked rice

title: Millionaire Pie
steps: Empty 1 large container Cool Whip into a bowl
Drain 1 large can crushed pineapple and mix it into the whipped topping
Add 1 can condensed milk
squeeze the juice from 3 lemons, removing seeds, and stir it in
Chop 1 cup pecans and fold into the mixture
Pour into 2 graham cracker crusts, cover, and chill overnight before serving

title: Double Cherry Delight
ingredients: 1 can (17 oz) dark sweet pitted cherries
steps: Drain 1 can (17 oz) dark sweet pitted cherries, reserving the syrup, and cut the cherries in half
Add 1/2 cup ginger ale to the syrup and enough water to make 1 1/2 cups liquid total
Dissolve 1 package (6 oz) cherry-flavored gelatin in 2 cups boiling water
Stir in the measured liquid and add 1/8 teaspoon almond extract
Chill until very thick
Fold in 1 cup miniature marshmallows and the cherries
Spoon into a 6-cup mold
Chill until firm, at least 4 hours or overnight

title: Buckeye Candy
steps: Mix together 1 box powdered sugar, 8 oz soft butter, and 1 jar (8 oz) peanut butter until smooth
Roll the mixture into small balls and place on a cookie sheet
Freeze for at least 30 minutes
Melt 12 oz chocolate chips together with paraffin in a double boiler
Dip each ball about three-quarters of the way into the chocolate mixture, leaving the top exposed

title: Quick Barbecue Wings
steps: Clean chicken wings in the quantity desired
Coat lightly with flour and fry until fully cooked
Transfer the wings to a microwave-safe bowl, add barbecue sauce to taste, and stir well
Microwave on high for 4 minutes, stirring once during cooking

title: Taco Salad Chip Dip
steps: Mix together 8 oz taco sauce, 8 oz sour cream, and 8 oz cream cheese until smooth
Spread the mixture onto a pizza pan
Brown 1 lb ground beef, drain excess fat, and mix with 1 package taco seasoning
Spread the meat over the cream mixture
Layer with shredded lettuce, 1 diced tomato, 1 diced onion, 1 diced green pepper, and shredded Colby or Cheddar cheese
Serve with chips

title: Pink Stuff Frozen Dessert
ingredients: 1 can cherry or strawberry pie filling
steps: Mix together 1 can cherry or strawberry pie filling, 1 can crushed pineapple drained, 1 can sweetened condensed milk, 1 container (8 oz) thawed whipped topping, and 2 tablespoons lemon juice
Pour into a 9 x 13-inch pan and freeze until firm
Let stand about 15 minutes before serving

title: Fresh Strawberry Pie
steps: Combine 1 1/2 cups water, 4 tablespoons cornstarch, 1 cup sugar, and 1/8 teaspoon salt in a saucepan
Bring to a boil, stirring constantly, until thick and clear
Remove from heat and stir in 4 tablespoons strawberry gelatin
Cool slightly without letting it set
Layer 1 quart cleaned strawberries in a baked pie shell
Pour glaze over them
Refrigerate
Serve with whipped cream

title: Easy German Chocolate Cake
steps: Prepare cake mixes according to package directions, adding 1/4 cup Wesson oil
Pour into a 9 x 13-inch pan
Bake as directed until done

title: Broccoli Salad
ingredients: 5 sliced green onions or 1/4 cup chopped red onion
steps: Trim and wash 1 large head broccoli, then cut into bite-size pieces
Add 10 slices cooked, crumbled bacon, 5 sliced green onions or 1/4 cup chopped red onion, and 1/2 cup raisins
Mix 1 cup mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons vinegar, and 1/4 cup sugar
Toss dressing with broccoli mixture and refrigerate for 2 to 3 hours before serving

title: Strawberry Whatever
steps: Dissolve 1 large package strawberry gelatin in 1 1/2 cups boiling water
Add 1 lb frozen strawberries in juice, 1 can crushed pineapple, 3 mashed ripe bananas, and 1 cup chopped pecans
Spread half the mixture in a pan and freeze for 30 minutes
Spread 1 pint sour cream over the top, then add remaining mixture
Chill until set

title: Eggless Milkless Applesauce Cake
steps: Cream together 1/2 cup shortening and 3/4 cup sugar
Add 1 1/2 cups applesauce, 1 cup raisins, and 1 cup nuts
Sift together 2 cups flour, 3 teaspoons soda, and 1 teaspoon each cinnamon, cloves, and nutmeg, then add to the mixture
Pour into a greased pan and bake at 350°F for 45 to 60 minutes

title: Grandma Hanrath’s Banana Bread
steps: Cream 1 cup sugar and 1/2 cup shortening
Add 2 eggs one at a time
stir in 1 teaspoon salt and 2 teaspoons soda
Add 2 chopped overripe bananas, 2 cups flour, and 1/4 cup nuts
Mix well
bake in a loaf pan at 350°F for 1 hour

title: Chocolate Frango Mints
steps: Mix together 1 package devil’s food cake mix, 1 package instant chocolate fudge pudding, 8 oz sour cream, 3/4 cup water, 1/2 cup Wesson oil, and 4 eggs
Beat for 5 minutes, scraping bowl often
Fold in 6 oz chopped Frango mints
Bake at 350°F for 35 to 40 minutes

title: Cuddy Farms Marinated Turkey
steps: Mix together 2 cups 7-Up or Sprite, 1 cup vegetable oil, 1 cup soy sauce, and garlic salt to taste
Cut a whole turkey breast into hand-sized pieces
Pour marinade over the meat
Refrigerate for at least 8 hours, up to 48 hours, before cooking

title: Spaghetti Sauce to Can
steps: Cook chopped peppers and onions in 1 cup oil for 30 minutes
Cook 1/2 bushel tomatoes and 1/4 cup minced garlic
Mill or process tomatoes and garlic
Combine tomatoes with tomato paste, sugar, salt, basil, oregano, and Italian seasoning
Cook 1 hour
Seal in jars

title: Prize-Winning Meat Loaf
steps: Mix together 1 1/2 lb ground beef, 1 cup tomato juice, 3/4 cup oats, 1 beaten egg, 1/4 cup chopped onion, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, and 1 1/2 teaspoons salt
Press into a loaf pan and bake at 350°F for 1 hour
Let rest 5 minutes before slicing

title: Smothered Round Steak
steps: Dredge 2 lb round steak in flour and brown briefly in 1/2 cup vegetable oil
Add chopped onions, celery, bell peppers, beef stock, salt, black pepper, white pepper, and red pepper
Cover and cook slowly over low heat until tender

title: Corral Barbecued Beef Steak Strips
steps: Brown 2 lb sliced round steak in 2 tablespoons oil
Combine 1 can tomato sauce, 1/3 cup water, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 1 tablespoon military, and 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce
Add sauce and sliced onion to meat and simmer 30 minutes until tender

title: Easy Fudge
steps: Heat 1 can sweetened condensed milk with 1 package semi-sweet chocolate chips and optional unsweetened chocolate over low heat, stirring until smooth
Remove from heat, stir in chopped nuts and 1 teaspoon vanilla
spread into a buttered pan

title: Taco-Filled Green Pepper
steps: Brown 1 lb ground beef and mix with taco seasoning, kidney beans, and 1 cup salsa
Cut 4 green peppers in half and boil for 3 minutes
Fill peppers with meat mixture and bake covered at 350°F for 15 to 20 minutes
Top with tomato, cheese, and sour cream

title: One Hour Rolls
steps: Heat 1 cup milk, 2 tablespoons sugar, 1 tablespoon salt, and 3 tablespoons oil until boiling
Cool to lukewarm
Add 1 package yeast and mix into 2 cups flour
Roll dough
Cut
Let rise 1 hour
Bake at 350°F for 20 minutes

title: Punch Bowl Fruit Salad
steps: Combine 2 cans sliced peaches, 2 cans fruit cocktail, 1 can diced pineapple with juice, 1 quart strawberries, 4 bananas, and assorted apples and grapes
Mix well
Chill before serving

title: Summer Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken cutlets in 1/2 cup oil, 1/3 cup red vinegar, 2 tablespoons oregano, and 2 tablespoons garlic salt
Cook as desired

title: Cherry Pizza
steps: Spread 2 cans cherry pie filling in a greased baking pan
Sprinkle dry white cake mix over cherries
top with ground nuts and melted butter
bake at 350°F for 45 minutes

title: Potato and Cheese Pie
steps: Beat 3 eggs with 1 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper
Stir in 2 cups half-and-half, 3 cups shredded potatoes, 1 cup Cheddar cheese, and 1/3 cup green onions
Bake at 400°F for 35 to 40 minutes

title: Tuna Macaroni Casserole
steps: Prepare 1 box macaroni and cheese as directed
Stir in 1 can drained tuna, 1 jar pimentos, and 1 chopped onion
Serve hot or cold

title: Artichoke Dip
steps: Drain and chop 2 cans artichoke hearts
mix with 1 cup mayonnaise and 1 cup Parmesan cheese
Bake uncovered at 350°F for 20 to 30 minutes

title: Broccoli Dip for Crackers
steps: Mix 16 oz sour cream, 1 package dry vegetable soup mix, 10 oz thawed chopped broccoli, and half of 6 oz grated Cheddar cheese
Top with remaining cheese
Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes

title: Summer Spaghetti
steps: Cook 1 lb thin spaghetti
drain
toss with butter
marinate overnight with Salad Supreme seasoning and Italian dressing
add vegetables before serving

title: Pear-Lime Salad
steps: Drain 1 can pear halves and reserve juice
Boil juice and dissolve lime gelatin in it
Cool slightly, then mix with softened cream cheese and lemon yogurt
Stir in pears and chill until set

title: Watermelon Rind Pickles
steps: Cut 7 lb watermelon rind into cubes and parboil until tender
Boil 7 cups sugar with 2 cups vinegar, 1/2 teaspoon oil of cloves, and 1/2 teaspoon oil of cinnamon
Pour over rind, soak overnight
Reheat twice
Seal in jars

title: Chicken Stew
steps: Remove meat from 3 lb boiled chicken and reserve the broth
Combine the chicken, potatoes, onions, creamed corn, English peas, field peas, butter beans, tomatoes, tomato juice, and macaroni in a large pot
Add salt, black pepper, and sugar
Cook over medium heat until all vegetables are tender

title: Quick Coffee Cake
steps: Cream together 3 tablespoons softened butter or margarine and 1/2 cup granulated sugar
Add 1 egg and beat until creamy
Mix 1 cup flour, 1 1/4 teaspoons baking powder, and 1/4 teaspoon salt, then add alternately with 1/3 cup milk
Stir in 1/4 teaspoon vanilla
Spread batter in a greased 8-inch square pan
Mix 1/3 cup packed brown sugar with 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, sprinkle on top, dot with 2 tablespoons butter
Bake at 350°F for 25 to 30 minutes

title: Angel Biscuits
steps: Mix together flour, sugar, baking powder, and soda
Cut in margarine
Dissolve yeast in warm water
Stir yeast mixture into buttermilk
Combine with dry ingredients
Cover and chill
Bake as biscuits

title: Quick Peppermint Puffs
steps: Dip 8 marshmallows in 2 tablespoons melted margarine
roll in 1/4 cup crushed peppermint candy
Wrap each marshmallow completely with crescent roll dough
Dip again in margarine
place in greased muffin tin
bake at 375°F for 10 to 15 minutes

title: Fruit Pizza
steps: Mix together 1 box yellow cake mix, 1/4 cup water, 1/4 cup brown sugar, 1/2 cup soft butter, 2 eggs, and 1/2 cup chopped nuts
Spread into greased pizza pans
Bake at 350°F for 15 to 20 minutes

title: Chocolate Mint Bars
steps: Mix together 1 cup flour, 1 cup sugar, 1/2 cup softened oleo, 4 eggs, and 1 can chocolate syrup
Pour into a 9 x 13-inch pan
Bake at 350°F for 25 to 30 minutes, until the top springs back lightly when touched

title: Beer Bread
steps: Stir together 3 cups self-rising flour, 1 tablespoon sugar, and 1 can (12 oz) beer
Pour into a greased loaf pan
bake at 425°F for 50 minutes
Drizzle melted butter over the top if desired

title: Chicken Divan
steps: melt 1/4 cup margarine in a skillet
sauté 1/4 cup chopped onion and celery to taste
remove from heat and stir in 1/4 cup flour and 1/8 teaspoon curry powder
drain 1 can mushrooms and reserve juice, adding water to make 1/2 cup liquid
stir liquid and 1 can cream of celery soup into mixture and cook until thick
arrange chopped broccoli and cubed cooked chicken in a baking dish
spoon sauce over
top with shredded Monterey Jack cheese
bake at 350°F until cheese melts

title: Mexican Cookie Rings
steps: Sift together flour, baking powder, and salt
Cream butter with sugar
Add egg yolks and vanilla
Mix in dry ingredients
Shape dough into rings
Dip into multi-colored candies
Bake at 375°F for 10 to 12 minutes

title: Vegetable-Burger Soup
steps: Brown 1/2 lb ground beef lightly in a soup pot
Drain excess fat
Add 2 cups water, 1 can stewed tomatoes, 1 can tomato sauce, 1 package onion soup mix, 1 package frozen mixed vegetables, 1 teaspoon sugar
Simmer for 20 minutes

title: Corn Pudding
steps: Mix 3/4 c. sugar, 2 Tbsp. flour, 1/2 tsp. salt, 2 eggs, 1 1/4 c. milk, 1/2 stick melted butter, and 1 1/2 pt. drained corn
pour into a baking dish
bake at 375°F for 1 hour

title: Chicken Cordon Blue
steps: pound 3 chicken breasts until thin
lay 3 slices Swiss or Jack cheese and 3 slices cooked ham on the breasts
roll up and secure with toothpicks
mix 3 Tbsp. flour, 1 tsp. salt, pepper to taste, and 1 tsp. paprika in a plastic bag
add the rolls to the bag and shake to coat
melt 3 Tbsp. butter in a frying pan and brown on all sides
add 1/2 c. white wine and 1 chicken bouillon cube to the pan
cover and simmer 30 minutes
remove chicken from the pan
add 1 c. whipping cream to the pan and cook on medium-high for 3 minutes until smooth and creamy
pour the sauce over the chicken

title: Corn Casserole
ingredients: 1 (16 oz.) container fat free sour cream
steps: mix 1 can creamed corn, 1 can whole corn, 1 stick margarine (melted), and 1 box Jiffy corn bread mix (dry) until well combined
stir in about 3/4 of the 1 (16 oz.) container fat free sour cream and mix well

title: Poppy Seed Bread
ingredients: 1 pkg. Betty Crocker butter pecan cake mix
steps: Mix 1 c. boiling water with 2 Tbsp. poppy seed and set aside
Mix 1 pkg. Betty Crocker butter pecan cake mix, 1 small pkg. instant coconut pudding, 1/2 c. oil, and 4 eggs
Add the seed-and-water mixture
Pour into 2 greased loaf pans
Bake at 325° for 1 hour

title: Buttermilk Brownie Cake
steps: combine 1 c. butter, 1/3 c. cocoa, and 1 cup water in a saucepan and bring to a boil stirring constantly
remove from heat
sift together 2 c. flour, 2 c. sugar, 1 tsp. soda, and 1/2 tsp. salt in a large bowl
stir in 2 slightly beaten eggs, 1/2 c. buttermilk, and 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
add the cocoa mixture and mix until blended
pour into a greased 15 x 10 x 1-inch pan and bake at 375° for 20 minutes
pour frosting over brownies and spread evenly

title: Seven Layer Salad
steps: Layer lettuce, tomatoes, boiled eggs, grated cheese, 2 cans English peas, Miracle Whip mayonnaise, and bacon bits in the order listed
cover with Miracle Whip mayonnaise
sprinkle bacon bits on top
refrigerate

title: Taco Salad
steps: Combine ground beef, chopped onions, chopped celery, chopped green bell pepper, cumin seed, garlic, and chili powder in a crock-pot and mix well
Add salt and pepper to taste and cook on low 3 to 4 hours
Heat Velveeta cheese with Ro-Tel tomatoes in a saucepan until melted, stirring constantly
Layer chopped lettuce, the beef mixture, chopped tomatoes, the cheese sauce, and crushed corn chips on individual plates

title: Pizza Dippers
ingredients: 10 oz. can Pillsbury refrigerator pizza crust
steps: Grease 1 large cookie sheet
Unroll 10 oz. can Pillsbury refrigerator pizza crust
Cut the rectangle in half crosswise and then into 8 (1-inch) strips
Place strips apart on the sheet
Brush with 2 Tbsp. margarine
Sprinkle with 1 1/2 tsp. pizza seasonings
Bake at 350° for 11 to 17 minutes
Sprinkle with 4 oz. (1 c.) shredded Mozzarella cheese and return to oven to melt
Serve immediately with 8 oz. warm pizza sauce for dipping

title: Madge’s Refrigerator Rolls
steps: Sprinkle 1 Tbsp. sugar over 1 pkg. yeast in 1/2 c. lukewarm water and let foam
Scald 1 pt. milk with 1/2 c. sugar, 1/2 c. shortening or oleo, and 1 Tbsp. salt, cool
Add the yeast
Fold in 2 egg whites beaten stiff
Stir in 6 c. sifted flour
Cover and let rise until doubled
Stir down
Refrigerate covered overnight
Bake in muffin tins using two small balls dipped in melted oleo to form one roll

title: Super Sundae Pie
steps: Stir 2 pt. (1 qt.) vanilla ice cream slightly softened until smooth
Spoon the ice cream into 1 (6 oz.) graham cracker pie crust and cover
Freeze several hours until hard
Let stand 10 minutes to soften
Spoon 1 jar strawberry topping onto the serving plate
Set a slice of pie on top
Garnish with 1 bottle chocolate sundae syrup plus 1/2 c. nuts, whipped cream, and maraschino cherries as desired
Return to freezer

title: Cranberry-Orange Relish For Poultry
steps: Combine ingredients in a saucepan
Bring to a boil over medium heat
Reduce heat and simmer until thick
Cool and refrigerate

title: Swedish Heirloom Cookies
steps: Cream 1/2 c. shortening with 1/2 c. butter until light and fluffy
Add 1 c. sifted powdered sugar and 1/2 tsp. salt and mix well
Stir in 2 c. all-purpose flour
Stir in 1 Tbsp. water, 1 Tbsp. vanilla extract, and 1 1/4 c. ground almonds
Shape into 1-inch balls
Place on ungreased baking sheets and flatten slightly
Bake at 325° for 12 to 15 minutes
Dredge warm cookies in powdered sugar

title: Garden Cabbage Salad
steps: Combine 1 small cabbage (finely shredded), 1 bunch green onions (chopped), 1 shredded carrot, 1 small green pepper (finely chopped), 6 radishes (thinly sliced), and 1 cucumber (finely chopped)
cover and chill
toss with Dressing just before serving

title: Kentucky Pecan Pie
steps: Mix 1 c. white corn syrup, 1 c. brown sugar, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/3 c. melted butter, 1 tsp. vanilla, 3 whole eggs, and 1 c. pecans
bake 45 minutes at 350°
decorate with whole pecan halves

title: London Broil
steps: Place the steak in a shallow pan
Combine salad oil, vinegar, and garlic and pour over the steak
Cover and refrigerate 3 hours or overnight, turning several times
Broil 3 inches from heat for about 5 minutes
Season with salt and pepper
Turn and broil for 3 minutes
Season again
Carve very thin slices diagonally across the grain

title: Hello Dolly Bars
steps: Melt 1 stick of Oleo
mix with 1 c. Graham Cracker Crumbs and spread in the bottom of a greased 9 x 13-inch pan
layer 1 c. Chocolate Chips, 1 c. Butterscotch Chips, 1 c. Walnuts chopped (optional), and 1 c. Coconut (shedded)
pour 1 c. Condensed Milk over top
bake at 350° for 30-35 minutes
cool
cut into bars

title: Macaroni And Cheese Casserole
ingredients: 1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup
steps: Mix 1 lb. sharp cheese (grated), 8 oz. macaroni (cooked and drained), 1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup, 2 oz. jar pimento, 1 c. mayonnaise, and 1/2 onion (grated)
cover with crumbled cheese crackers and dot with butter
bake at 325° for 40 minutes

title: Betsy’s Chocolate Fudge Cake
steps: melt 3 sq. unsweetened chocolate over hot water and cool
grease and flour 2 to 3 (9-inch) cake pans
sift together 2 1/4 c. sifted flour, 2 tsp. baking powder, and 1/2 tsp. salt
beat 1/2 c. butter until soft
add 2 1/4 c. packed light brown sugar and 3 eggs and beat at high speed until light and fluffy
beat in 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla and the chocolate
stir in dry ingredients alternating with 1 c. sour cream, beating well after each addition
stir in 1 c. boiling water
pour into pans and bake at 350° for 35 minutes
cool 10 minutes in pans then turn out and cool completely
ice with Chocolate Fudge Frosting

title: Cream Cheese Squares
steps: Mix 1 box yellow cake mix with 1 egg and 1 stick margarine
press into a 9 x 12-inch sheet cake pan
mix and cream together 1 box 10x sugar, 2 eggs, and 8 oz. cream cheese
spread over the base
bake at 350° for 40 minutes
cut when cool

title: Beef Barbecue
steps: Put boneless chuck roast in a pot
add ketchup, water, mustard, lemon juice, vinegar, and chopped onion
cook on low to medium heat for 3 to 4 hours
add extra water and ketchup if liquid disappears
cook until the meat will shred

title: Chicken Stroganoff
steps: Slice 1 lb. chicken breasts into thin strips
Heat 1 Tbsp. of the 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat
Add 2 medium onions and sauté 2 minutes
Add 1/2 lb. mushrooms and sauté 3 minutes
Remove vegetables and reserve
Heat remaining oil, add chicken and 1 tsp. minced garlic and cook as for stir-fry
Return vegetables to the skillet
Add 1/2 c. chicken broth and 1/8 tsp. pepper
Mix 1 Tbsp. cornstarch with 2 Tbsp. water and stir into skillet
Bring to a boil and boil 1 minute stirring constantly
Remove from heat and stir in 1 (8 oz.) pkg. yogurt
Heat gently over low (do not boil)
Serve over hot cooked noodles

title: Cream Pie And Pudding (Microwave)
steps: Combine 3/4 c. sugar, 3/8 c. flour, and 1/4 tsp. salt in a deep 2-quart glass bowl
add 2 eggs or 3 egg yolks and 2 c. milk
beat with a whisk until smooth
microwave at full power for 8 minutes stirring 3 times

title: Crispix Cookies
steps: Melt butterscotch morsels with semi-sweet chocolate morsels in a large saucepan over low heat, stirring constantly until smooth
Remove from heat and add salted peanuts and Kellogg's Crispix cereal
Stir gently until well coated
Drop by teaspoons onto waxed paper
Chill until firm

title: Rum Balls
steps: Combine 3 c. finely crushed vanilla wafers with 1 c. finely chopped nuts and 1/2 cup of the 1 1/2 c. powdered sugar in a large bowl
Melt 1 c. semi-sweet chocolate with 1/2 c. light corn syrup
Stir in 1/3 c. rum until smooth
Pour over the crumb mixture and mix thoroughly
Roll into 1-inch balls
Place on wax paper
Roll each ball in the remaining 1 c. powdered sugar
Store airtight for at least 3 days before serving

title: Millionaire Cake
ingredients: 20 oz. can crushed pineapple and juice
steps: Beat together 2 c. flour, 2 c. sugar, 2 tsp. soda, 2 eggs, 1 c. coconut, 1 c. chopped nuts, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 tsp. salt, and a 20 oz. can crushed pineapple and juice
Bake in a 9 x 13-inch pan at 350° for 45 to 55 minutes

title: Hawaiian Carrots
steps: Scrape and cut carrots into small pieces
Cook and drain carrots
Drain pineapple
Cook pineapple juice with cornstarch, oleo, and brown sugar until thick
Add carrots and pineapple and simmer 10 minutes

title: Ginny’s Salad
steps: Wash, dry, and break red leaf lettuce into bite-size pieces
Toss lettuce with Mozzarella cheese and chopped walnuts
Mix with Good Seasons Italian dressing according to directions just before serving

title: Onion Soup
steps: Cook 2 large onions in 1 Tbsp. butter and 1 Tbsp. vegetable oil for 15 minutes stirring occasionally
Add 1/4 tsp. sugar and cook 15 minutes until onions are brown
Sprinkle with 2 Tbsp. flour and blend in 6 c. beef broth plus 1/4 c. white wine and seasonings
Simmer 30 minutes
Lightly toast 4 to 8 slices French bread in a 350° oven for 20 minutes
Baste each slice with 1/2 teaspoon of the 2 tsp. vegetable oil and garlic
Serve soup with toast floating on top, sprinkle with 1 to 2 c. grated Swiss cheese
Bake 15 minutes, and serve hot

title: Banana Walnut Cake
steps: Cream 3/4 c. shortening (butter) and gradually add 2 1/4 c. sugar, creaming until light and fluffy
Add 3 eggs (beaten well)
Sift 3 c. cake flour before measuring then add 3 tsp. baking powder, 3/4 tsp. soda, and 3/4 tsp. salt
Add 6 Tbsp. sour milk alternating with the flour mixture, beating after each addition
Add 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
Add 1 1/2 c. banana pulp and beat well
Stir in 1 1/2 c. chopped walnuts
Pour into a greased Bundt pan
Bake at 350° for 50 to 60 minutes

title: Fish And Broccoli Roll-Ups
steps: Cut 16 oz. flounder or haddock into strips
Cut 4 c. broccoli into small pieces
Alternate broccoli pieces and rolled fish strips onto kabob spears
Add 8 lemon wedges to each end
Baste with 1/2 c. salad dressing
Broil 8 to 10 minutes

title: Fat Free Pizza Treats
steps: Top toasted English muffins with pizza sauce
add toppings of your choice
add 1 Tbsp. skim Mozzarella cheese
toast in a toaster oven until cheese melts

title: Sesame Chicken Wings
steps: Whisk together light soy sauce, garlic clove, ginger, honey, and black pepper
Add chicken wings and toss to coat
Marinate covered and chilled for 2 hours
Line a pan with foil and arrange wings in one layer
Brush with Oriental sesame oil
Sprinkle with sesame seed
Bake at 400° for 30 to 35 minutes basting occasionally with the reserved marinade

title: Imitation Crabmeat Salad
steps: Shred 2 lb. imitation crabmeat into thin strips about 1/4 to 1/2-inch x 3 to 4-inches long
Cook 1 pkg. spiral pasta and drain
Combine pasta with crabmeat

Add 8 oz. sour cream, 10 oz. mayonnaise, 3 to 4 sticks celery, 3 to 4 green onions, 6 oz. water chestnuts, 6 oz. frozen pea pods, 1/4 tsp. dill weed, 1/4 tsp. onion powder, 1/4 tsp. Beau Monde, 1/4 tsp. celery salt, and 1/4 tsp. pepper
Chill at least 1/2 hour before serving

title: Macaroni And Cottage Cheese
steps: Cook 3 c. uncooked macaroni until tender and drain
mix in 1 small carton cottage cheese
brown 1/2 stick butter in a skillet and pour over
add salt and pepper to taste and serve

title: String Pie
steps: Brown ground beef with chopped onion and green onion in a large skillet
Drain fat from the skillet
Stir in spaghetti sauce
Combine Parmesan cheese, eggs, and butter in a large bowl and mix well
Spread the cheese mixture in the bottom of a 13 x 9-inch pan
Spread cottage cheese over top
Pour the sauce mixture over cottage cheese
Sprinkle with Mozzarella cheese
Bake at 350° until cheese melts

title: Easters Hamburgers
steps: Brown hamburger patties
Slice raw onions on top
Mix 1 can tomato sauce with 1/2 tsp. dry mustard, 2 Tbsp. brown sugar, salt and pepper, and chili powder
Pour over hamburgers
Bake 1 hour at 350°

title: Coconut Macaroons
steps: Combine 1 1/3 c. coconut, 2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour, 1/3 c. sugar, and 1/2 tsp. salt
stir in 2 egg whites and 1/2 tsp. almond extract and mix well
lightly grease a cookie sheet
cut maraschino cherries into quarters
drop batter by teaspoonfuls about 1-inch apart and top each with a cherry
bake at 325° for 20 to 25 minutes
remove when edges are golden

title: Cranberry Salad
steps: Put 3 oranges, 2 apples, and 1 lb. cranberries through a food chopper
drain a No. 2 can crushed pineapple and add it
dissolve 2 small pkg. Jell-O plus 1 1/2 c. sugar in 2 c. water
mix into the fruit mixture
add 1 c. chopped nuts
refrigerate about 24 hours before serving

title: Lazy Day Salad
ingredients: 1 large can crushed pineapple with juice
steps: Mix by hand
fold in 1 large container Cool Whip
refrigerate all day or overnight

title: Pear Relish
steps: Let pears, onions, green peppers, sweet red peppers, and hot peppers stand in separate containers for 1 hour
Pour boiling water over each and drain well
Combine everything in a large kettle with vinegar, sugar, mustard seed, pickling salt, turmeric, allspice, cinnamon, and ginger
Bring to a boil then reduce heat and simmer uncovered 30 minutes
Ladle into hot sterilized jars leaving 1/4 inch headspace
Remove air bubbles and wipe rims
Apply lids and bands
Process in a boiling water bath 20 minutes
Store in a cool place 1 month before using
Chill before serving

title: Strawberry Bread
ingredients: 2 1/2 c. fresh crushed strawberries or 2 (10 oz.) containers frozen strawberries
steps: Preheat oven to 350°
Grease and flour two 9 x 5-inch loaf pans
Stir strawberries with eggs and salad oil
Combine flour, sugar, cinnamon, soda, salt, and chopped nuts
Add the berry mixture to the dry ingredients and stir until blended
Pour into pans
Bake 1 hour or until a toothpick comes out clean

title: Strawberry Salad
steps: Dissolve 2 pkg. strawberry Jello in 1 c. boiling water
add 1 large can crushed pineapple, 3 mashed bananas, 1 c. chopped pecans, and 1 to 2 c. sour cream
pour half of the mixture into a pan and let set
spread on cream
add remaining Jello mixture

title: Chili Beef Casserole
steps: Cook 1 c. macaroni in boiling salted water until done
Brown 3/4 lb. extra lean ground beef in a skillet
Add 1 can tomato soup and 1 can chili beef soup along with the macaroni
Heat 5 to 7 minutes stirring occasionally until bubbly
Cut 3 slices sharp processed American cheese diagonally and place on top
Cover briefly to melt
Serve at once

title: Bread
steps: Dissolve yeast in warm water
Add melted butter or shortening, sugar, and salt
Add whole wheat flour and blend with an electric mixer
Gradually add bread flour, folding in the last flour by hand
Knead on a floured surface
Place in an oiled bowl and oil the top
Cover with wax paper and let rise until doubled
Divide into pans and let rise again
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes to 1 hour until golden brown

title: Salmon Casserole Baked In Sour Cream
steps: Place reserved liquid from can salmon in a bowl
Add lemon juice, salt, pepper, sour cream, and dry dill weed and mix until smooth
Break salmon into large chunks and place in a greased 1-quart casserole
Pour sauce over salmon
Top with thinly sliced onion and chopped parsley
Cover and bake at 350° for 30 minutes

title: Carrie’s Cabbage Soup
steps: Combine all ingredients except ground beef or sausage
Bring to a rolling boil
Simmer about 3 hours
Add 1 lb. ground beef (browned, optional) or 1 lb. sausage in the last 20 minutes

title: Chicken And Pasta Salad
steps: Combine cooked and drained egg noodles with cooked chicken breasts, seedless green grapes, and sliced almonds
Mix mayonnaise, Ranch dressing, creamy Italian dressing, and a little sugar to taste to form the dressing
Pour the dressing over the noodle mixture and toss

title: Calico Beans
steps: Brown 1 lb. hamburger and 1/2 lb. chopped bacon
Add 1 medium chopped onion and 1/2 c. chopped celery
Mix together 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 c. brown sugar, 1 c. catsup, 1 Tbsp. liquid smoke, 1 Tbsp. mustard, and 1 Tbsp. vinegar
Combine with 1 can lima beans, 1 can pork and beans, 1 can red beans, and 1 can black-eyed peas
Mix with the meat
Bake in a casserole dish at 350° for 45 minutes

title: Ham Roll-Up
steps: Spread soft cream cheese over 1/2 lb. thin-sliced boiled ham
place a breadstick on each slice
roll up

title: Penne Al’Arrabbiato
steps: Bring water to a boil and cook pasta
sauté garlic in olive oil briefly
add chopped tomatoes, parsley, red peppers, and salt
simmer in an open skillet until pasta is cooked
toss sauce with drained pasta
garnish with fresh parsley

title: Corn Casserole
steps: Mix 1 can creamed corn, 1 can whole corn (drained), 2 eggs, 1 stick oleo, 1 (8 oz.) sour cream, and 1 small box corn muffin mix
pour into a 2 to 3-quart casserole
bake at 350° for 45 minutes

title: Vegetable Dip
steps: Mix 2 c. mayonnaise, 2 c. sour cream, 1/2 c. chopped green onions, 1/2 c. chopped green pepper, 1/2 c. diced pimentos, 1/4 c. Bac*Os, 1/2 tsp. Tabasco, 1/4 tsp. garlic powder or salt, and salt and pepper to taste
Refrigerate several hours or overnight

title: Spinach Dip
steps: Thaw and drain 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
Mix spinach with cream cheese, parsley, onions, salt, Season-All, black pepper, and garlic powder
Slice California oranges, limes, and lemons paper thin
Pour 2 bottles Sangaree Punch over an ice mold
Add 5 oz. cognac, 2 oz. Triple Sec, 5 oz. vodka, and 2 oz. Meyers dark rum
Add fruit after 1 hour
Serve

title: Easy Chicken Pot Pie
steps: Lightly spray a 9 x 13-inch baking dish
Line the bottom with cooked chicken
Mix Veg-All vegetables with cream of chicken soup, cream of onion soup, and cream of mushroom soup and spread over chicken
Mix melted butter or margarine with milk and flour and pour over the soup layer
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes until golden brown

title: Fruit Pizza
steps: Spread Pillsbury sugar cookie dough onto a baking sheet
bake 12 to 13 minutes at the temperature listed on the package
cool completely
loosen with a knife
top with 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese mixed with 1/3 c. sugar
decorate with fruit of your choice

title: Grasshopper Pie
steps: Crush 22 Oreo cookies and mix with 1/4 c. margarine
press into a pie plate and bake at 350° for 10 minutes
cool completely
fill with a mixture of 1/4 c. creme de menthe, 1 (7 oz.) jar Marshmallow Fluff, and 1 pt. whipped cream

title: Squash Souffle
ingredients: 2 Tbsp. butter or Land O Lakes sweet cream spread
1 c. grated reduced fat Cheddar cheese
steps: Cook and mash 2 c. yellow squash with 2 Tbsp. butter or Land O Lakes sweet cream spread
add 4 egg whites (well beaten), 1 c. milk (1%), salt and pepper, and 1 c. Ritz cracker crumbs
pour into a Pam-sprayed casserole
top with 1 c. grated reduced fat Cheddar cheese
bake at 350° for 30 to 45 minutes until firm

title: Loris’s Egg Salad
steps: Mash 6 hard-boiled eggs with 1 chopped sweet gherkin pickle, 1/4 c. chopped onion, and 1/4 c. chopped green pepper
stir in 1/3 c. Miracle Whip
add 1 small jar pimento (drained), 1 tsp. salt, and a dash of paprika
chill
serve

title: Apple Kuchen
steps: Divide 1 recipe Basic Sweet Dough into 2 portions and press into two buttered 8 x 8-inch pans
Press in 4 peeled and sliced apples rounded side up
Sprinkle with 1/2 c. sugar mixed with 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
Drizzle with 1/4 c. melted butter
Let rise until doubled
Bake at 350° for 40 to 50 minutes until golden

title: Eggplant-Tomato Casserole
steps: Peel and slice 1 small eggplant into 1/4-inch rounds
Peel and slice 4 tomatoes
Layer eggplant in a 2-quart casserole
Sprinkle with salt and pepper
Top with tomatoes, oregano flakes, and some of the 1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Repeat layers ending with cheese
Cover and bake at 400° for 30 to 40 minutes until eggplant is tender

title: Strawberry Bread
steps: Combine dry ingredients
Mix wet ingredients separately
Stir wet ingredients into dry just until moistened
Add chopped nuts if desired
Pour into greased loaf pans
Bake at 350° for 1 hour

title: Salsa
steps: Mix 6 diced tomatoes with 1 (4 oz.) can chopped green chilies, 1 bunch green onions (chopped), 1 1/2 c. finely diced celery, 2 medium yellow onions (chopped), 1 c. chopped cilantro or parsley, 2 (15 oz.) cans tomato sauce, 1 tsp. cumin, garlic (fresh or powdered) to taste, and salt and pepper
Chill 1 hour before serving
Stir well before serving

title: Meatball Stew
steps: Combine 2 c. cornflakes cereal, 1 egg, 1 (10 1/2 oz.) can beef broth, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/8 tsp. pepper, and 1 lb. ground beef and form into meatballs
Brown the meatballs in 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Add 1 (10 3/4 oz.) can tomato soup, 1/2 c. water, 1/4 tsp. thyme, 2 c. frozen sliced carrots, 1 medium onion, 1 can whole white potatoes, and dried parsley flakes
Simmer until vegetables are tender

title: Cauliflower-Broccoli Casserole
steps: Simmer 1 box frozen cauliflower and 1 box frozen broccoli until tender
Melt 1/2 stick butter in a skillet and add 1 c. cream of mushroom soup, 1/2 c. milk, and 8 oz. Velveeta cheese cooking until melted
Combine vegetables with cheese mixture and 1 c. cooked rice
Bake uncovered at 350° for 30 minutes

title: Cabbage Casserole
steps: Sauté 1/2 c. chopped celery, 1/2 c. chopped bell pepper, and 1 small chopped onion in margarine
add 3 c. shredded cabbage and 1/4 c. water
cover and steam 5 to 6 minutes
remove from heat and stir in 1 c. cream of celery soup and pimento
transfer to a casserole dish
top with Pepperidge Farm herb stuffing mixed with butter
bake at 350° for 20 minutes

title: Best Ever Salad
steps: Cook 8 oz. fine spaghetti (or 7 oz. Mexican angel hair) and cool
add 1/2 c. chopped onion, 1/2 c. chopped green pepper, 1/2 c. chopped celery, 2 c. chopped tomatoes, salt and pepper, and 1/4 tsp. curry
stir in 1 can cream of celery soup and a small amount of mayonnaise if needed

title: Black Bottom Cupcakes
steps: Mix 8 oz. cream cheese with 1 egg, 1/3 c. sugar, and 1/8 tsp. salt and stir in 6 oz. chocolate chips
Mix 1 1/2 c. flour, 1 c. sugar, 1/4 c. cocoa, 1 tsp. baking soda, and 1/2 tsp. salt
Add 1 c. water, 1/3 c. cooking oil, 1 Tbsp. vinegar, and 1 tsp. vanilla and beat well
Fill cupcake liners 1/3 full with chocolate batter
Top with cream cheese mixture
Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes

title: Tuna Casserole
ingredients: 1 large box Kraft macaroni and cheese dinner
steps: Prepare 1 large box Kraft macaroni and cheese dinner according to package directions
cook and drain peas if frozen
sauté 3/4 c. celery and 1/2 c. onion and drain
combine with 1 large can tuna fish, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 2 c. peas, 1/2 c. water, and salt and pepper to taste
bake at 350° for 35 minutes

title: Oatmeal Pie (Cheap Pecan Pie)
steps: Cream 2 sticks margarine with 4 eggs
Add 3/4 c. uncooked quick oatmeal, 1 1/4 c. dark Karo syrup, 1 1/4 c. white sugar, 3/4 c. coconut, and 2 tsp. vanilla
Pour into 2 unbaked pie shells
Bake at 325° for 1 hour

title: Chili Con Carne
steps: Brown hamburger with garlic and onion
Stir in chili powder, salt, and pepper
Add can tomatoes and kidney beans
Bring to a boil
Add spaghetti
Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes
Stir often and add hot water if too thick

title: Swiss Chicken Casserole
ingredients: 2 c. Pepperidge Farm herb stuffing mix
steps: Arrange chicken breast halves in a lightly greased 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish
Top each with a slice of Swiss cheese
Mix cream chicken soup with milk and spoon over chicken
Sprinkle with Pepperidge Farm herb stuffing mix
Drizzle with melted margarine
Cover and bake at 350° for 50 minutes

title: Happy Face Cookies
steps: Mix 4 1/2 lb. butter with 3 lb. sugar (6 c.)
add 3 c. eggs and 2 c. water
blend in 5 1/2 lb. flour, 1/3 c. baking powder, 3 tsp. salt, 2 Tbsp. vanilla, and 2 1/3 c. powdered milk
roll out dough
cut shapes
bake at 350°

title: No Bake Cookies
steps: Melt 1 pkg. almond bark according to package directions
stir in 2 c. miniature marshmallows, 2 c. salted peanuts, 2 c. Rice Krispies, and 2 c. Cap’n Crunch
drop and shape on waxed paper

title: Slinky
steps: Pour 2/3 c. sparkling mineral water and 2/3 c. unsweetened apple juice into a glass
stir in 1 Tbsp. freshly squeezed lemon juice
garnish with a few apple slices and a sprig of mint

title: Peach Cobbler
steps: Melt 1 stick butter in a baking dish
Sift together 1 c. flour and 1 c. sugar
Stir in 2 c. milk to form a batter
Pour into the melted butter
Add 2 c. fresh peaches on top without stirring
Bake at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes

title: Green Bean Specialty
steps: Heat and drain 2 cans green beans
Mix 4 Tbsp. bacon grease, 4 Tbsp. brown sugar, 4 Tbsp. vinegar, and 2 Tbsp. military, and heat
Pour over beans
Top with 4 pieces cooked and crumbled bacon
Serve hot

title: Raspberry Nut Perfection
ingredients: 1 (1 lb. 6 oz.) can red raspberry pie filling
steps: Spread red raspberry pie filling in an 8-inch square pan
Mix white cake mix with water and egg and pour over filling
Sprinkle with flaked coconut and chopped pecans
Drizzle with melted butter
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes
Serve warm

title: Mexican Chicken
steps: Boil 1 whole chicken in water
cool and cut into pieces
place in a 9 x 13-inch dish
layer with 1 chopped onion, 1/2 lb. cheese, 1/2 bag taco-flavored Doritos (crushed)
top with 1 can cream of chicken soup, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, and 1 can Ro-Tel

title: 10 Minute Peanut Brittle
steps: mix 1 c. sugar, 1/2 c. light corn syrup, and 1/4 tsp. salt in a 2-quart casserole
microwave on High 5 minutes
stir in 1 to 1 1/2 c. raw peanuts
microwave 2 to 6 minutes stirring every 2 minutes until lightly browned
stir in 1 Tbsp. butter or margarine, 1 tsp. vanilla, and 1 tsp. soda until foamy
spread 1/4-inch thick on a well-buttered cookie sheet
cool
break into pieces

title: Onion Dressing
steps: Shake together in a covered jar

title: Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies
steps: melt 1 stick margarine in a saucepan
add 1/2 c. milk, 1/2 c. cocoa, and 2 c. sugar and boil 1 minute
remove from heat and stir in 3/4 c. peanut butter until smooth
add 1 tsp. vanilla, 3 c. oats, and 1/4 c. nuts if desired
drop quickly by teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper

title: Pastry Crunch
steps: Melt 1 (24 oz.) vanilla flavored candy coating in the microwave according to package directions
Stir in 3 c. corn and rice cereal, 2 c. chow mein noodles, 2 c. small pretzel twists, 1 c. salted peanuts, and 1 c. pecan pieces
Spread on wax paper to cool
Break into pieces and store in an airtight container

title: Chippewa Soup
steps: Soak 1 lb. green split peas overnight
heat a small amount of oil in a very large pot
add 1 qt. diced carrots, 2 qt. chopped onions, and 1 qt. diced celery and sweat the vegetables
add 6 cloves garlic and cook a few minutes more
stir in 4 oz. curry powder
add 2 qt. tomato puree, 1 gal. water, 10 oz. smoked ham, 2 diced potatoes, 1 oz. marjoram, 1 oz. basil, 1 oz. oregano, 1 oz. thyme, 4 bay leaves, and the soaked peas
bring to a boil
reduce heat and simmer about 3 hours
remove bay leaves
puree the soup
chill thoroughly

title: Coconut Cream Pie (Low Calorie)
steps: Mix 2 boxes sugar-free instant vanilla pudding with 3 c. low-fat milk
stir in 1 c. coconut
pour into 1 baked pie crust
top with 4 oz. Cool Whip (lite)
sprinkle with toasted coconut
refrigerate

title: Voodoo Chicken
steps: Mix 2 c. white vinegar, 2 Tbsp. soy sauce, 1 large sliced onion, 4 cloves garlic, and 1/2 tsp. black pepper
Add 2 1/2 lb. chicken pieces and marinate overnight
Remove chicken
Coat with a mixture of 4 Tbsp. Dijon mustard and 6 Tbsp. ketchup
Bake skin-side down at 350° for 30 minutes
Turn chicken
Mix remaining mustard and ketchup with 2 Tbsp. milk and remaining marinade
Pour over chicken
Bake another 45 minutes

title: Chicken Divan
steps: Butter a 13 x 9-inch dish
boil and debone 2 whole chicken breasts and cut into bite-size pieces
steam 20 oz. frozen chopped broccoli and place in dish
top with chicken and 6 to 8 slices American cheese
mix 2 cans cream of celery soup with 1 tsp. curry powder and 2 tsp. lemon juice and pour over
top with 8 oz. sliced sharp Cheddar cheese
mix 1 c. plain bread crumbs with 1/2 stick melted margarine and sprinkle over casserole
bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes

title: Old Fashioned Tea Cakes
steps: Cream 1 c. butter with 2 c. sugar
add 4 eggs one at a time
mix in 1 Tbsp. milk, 1 tsp. nutmeg, and 1 tsp. vanilla
sift together 4 c. flour and 3 Tbsp. baking powder and combine with the mixture
add enough extra flour to roll and cut
bake on ungreased cookie sheets at 325° for 15 minutes

title: French Toast And Sauce
steps: Beat together 4 eggs, 1/2 c. milk, 1/2 c. thawed frozen lemonade, and 1/4 tsp. salt
Melt 1 Tbsp. of the 8 Tbsp. butter in a skillet for each slice
Dip 8 slices day-old bread in the egg mixture and cook until browned on both sides
Serve with sauce as directed

title: Spaghetti Pie
steps: Cook 6 oz. spaghetti
Stir 2 Tbsp. olive oil into hot spaghetti
Add 1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese and 2 well-beaten eggs
Press into a 10-inch pie plate sprayed with Pam to form a crust
Spread 1 c. cottage cheese or Ricotta over the bottom
Brown 1 lb. low-fat ground beef with 1/2 c. chopped onion and 1/4 chopped green pepper
Add about 2 c. spaghetti sauce
Pour over crust
Top with 1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella (2 oz.)
Bake at 350°

title: Baked Corn
steps: Mix 1 can whole kernel corn (drained), 1 can cream-style corn, 8 oz. sour cream, 1 stick melted oleo, and 1 box Jiffy corn bread mix
bake at 350° for 1 hour

title: Chicken Casserole
steps: Mix 2 c. diced cooked chicken, 1 c. chopped celery, 1 c. cooked rice, 1 can cream of chicken soup, 3/4 c. mayonnaise, 1 c. chopped pecans, 1/2 c. melted butter, and 1 diced onion in a buttered casserole
sprinkle grated cheese on top
bake at 350° until bubbly, at least 1 hour

title: Favorite Chocolate Cake
steps: Sift together flour, baking powder, salt, soda, and cocoa
Add sugar, eggs, red food coloring, shortening, and buttermilk
Beat with an electric mixer 2 minutes
Pour into greased and floured pans
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes

title: Blue Muffins
steps: Mix 1 egg, 1 c. milk, 2 Tbsp. melted shortening, 2 Tbsp. sugar, 2 c. flour, and 2 c. blueberries thoroughly
pour into muffin pans
bake at 350°

title: Devil’s Chicken (Pollo Alla Diavola)
steps: Cut open the chicken by removing the backbone and flattening
Mix olive oil, hot pepper sauce, lemon juice, ground pepper, and salt
Marinate the chicken for 2 hours
Cook the chicken as directed

title: Friendship Tea
steps: Mix 1/2 c. instant tea, 2 c. Tang, 1 pkg. Wyler’s lemonade mix (3 oz.), 1 tsp. cinnamon, and 2 c. sugar
Use 3 heaping tablespoonfuls per cup of hot water

title: Heath Bar Pie
steps: Mix 3 finely chopped Heath bars with 1 medium container whipping topping
pour into 1 graham cracker pie crust
top with chocolate curls or chopped nuts
refrigerate

title: Victorian Baked French Toast
steps: Cook 1 c. brown sugar, 1/3 c. butter, and 2 Tbsp. light corn syrup until melted
Pour into a 9 x 13-inch pan
Arrange 8 slices French bread on top
Mix 5 eggs with 1 1/2 c. milk and 1 tsp. cinnamon and pour over bread
Refrigerate overnight if desired
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes until lightly browned

title: Quick Swedish Meatballs
steps: Mix 1 lb. ground beef, 1 c. soft bread crumbs, 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, 1/4 c. dry onion soup mix, 1/4 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp. nutmeg, and 1/4 c. of the 1 1/2 c. milk
Form into balls and brown lightly
Place in a baking dish
Blend remaining milk with 1 pkg. stroganoff sauce mix
Cook until thick
Pour over meatballs
Bake at 350° for 30 to 45 minutes

title: Irish Stew (Microwave)
steps: Combine lamb cubes, water, onion soup mix, and bay leaf in a 4-quart casserole and microwave covered on High 7 to 8 minutes
Cook on power level 3 for 35 to 40 minutes stirring occasionally
Add thinly sliced carrots and cook 15 minutes more
Add cubed baked potatoes
Blend flour with remaining water and stir in
Microwave 5 minutes until thickened

title: Peach Salad
steps: Dissolve Peach Jello in hot water with sugar
bring to a boil
remove from heat
add Peach baby food and crushed pineapple
mix in condensed milk and softened cream cheese

title: Hidden Valley Ranch Oyster Crackers
ingredients: 1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch salad dressing mix
steps: Mix 1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch salad dressing mix with 3/4 to 1 c. salad oil
add 1/4 tsp. lemon pepper, 1/2 to 1 tsp. dill weed, and 1/4 tsp. garlic powder
pour over 12 to 16 oz. plain oyster crackers and stir to coat
warm in a very low oven for 15 to 20 minutes
